name: Fresh Lemon Bundt Cake
author: Handy Andy
summary: This is a beautiful golden-colored, moist cake that stays fresh that you can bake two or three days ahead.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease and flour a fluted tube pan (such as a Bundt®)
Beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light and fluffy
The mixture should be noticeably lighter in color
Add eggs one at a time, alternating with flour, allowing each egg and portion of flour to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next
Stir lemon juice and zest into flour mixture until batter is just combined; pour into prepared pan
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean, 45 to 55 minutes
